title: Just a Chill Day !!
p: A stress free day with your closest friends is a must every now and then. So, let's make this day today, and give yourself the right to relax ! Here is how you can make the best of this day :
list: Paint canvas or frames in group
Prepare a candies and snacks platter to eat while chatting in the evening
Do a cozy indoor movie night while watching your favorite romcoms
Do a skin-care and gossip night
Have a fun board-games evening with fun snacks and drinks
If you are in a country with nice weather, do a picnic and explore a new neighbourhood
Try cooking a new recipe together for dinner
Do karaoke (at home using your TV or Laptop, if you cannot go to a karaoke bar)
Take group photos or matching photos to post in your stories
Blast your favorite songs and dance to them
